situation: An open cylindrical tank 0.30m in diameter and 0.80m high is partially filled with water to a certain depth. It is then rotated about its vertical axis at 240rpm but no water spilled out.

subquestions.question: Estimate how deep the water in the tank is, in meters.
At what speed, in rpm, would the tank be rotated if 1.4 liters of water is spilled out?
At what speed, in rpm, would the tank be rotated so that the pressure at the center of the bottom of tank would be zero?
